title: Potential Energy - compare energies of springs

content.description: Which of the following correctly compares the potential energy of the systems at maximum displacement from equilibrium and the potential energy of the systems at their equilibrium positions.
content.question: Potential Energy at Maximum Displacement from Equilibrium Potential Energy at Equilibrium A <math alttext="U sub A comma 1, end sub, is greater than U sub B comma 1, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,1</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,1</mtext></msub></math> <math alttext="U sub A comma 2, end sub, equals U sub B comma 2, end sub" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>U</mi> <mtext>A,2</mtext> </msub> <mo>=</mo> <msub> <mi>U</mi> <mtext>B,2</mtext> </msub> </math> B <math alttext="U sub A comma 1, end sub, is greater than U sub B comma 1, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,1</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,1</mtext></msub></math> <math alttext="U sub A comma 2, end sub, is less than U sub B comma 2, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,2</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,2</mtext></msub></math> C <math alttext="U sub A comma 1, end sub, is less than U sub B comma 1, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,1</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,1</mtext></msub></math> <math alttext="U sub A comma 2, end sub, equals U sub B comma 2, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,2</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,2</mtext></msub></math> D <math alttext="U sub A comma 1, end sub, is less than U sub B comma 1, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,1</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,1</mtext></msub></math> <math alttext="U sub A comma 2, end sub, is less than U sub B comma 2, end sub" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>A,2</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mtext>B,2</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
